record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT REQUEST--H.R. 980

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of the leader, I ask unanimous consent--and I ask it not be taken out of my time--that H.R. 980 remain the pending business.
Yes, Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Enzi, the ranking member of the committee of jurisdiction, I object.

record.chair: The Senator from North Dakota is recognized.
